Il Tuo angolo di Paradiso nel Limoneto: Your corner of Paradise in the Lemon Grove
un rifugio esclusivo nato da una complet: An exclusive retreat born from a complete renovation and immersed in the quiet of a fragrant lemon grove. Here, luxury, comfort and nature meet to offer you a regenerating stay.
Esplora i nostri limoneti privati con sp: Explore our private lemon groves with stunning coastal views
4 camere da letto king-size e 3 bagni mo: 4 king-size bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms with premium amenities
Perfetto per indimenticabili serate all': Perfect for unforgettable evenings outdoors surrounded by greenery, with a refreshing outdoor shower.
Cucina in muratura completamente attrezz: Fully equipped masonry kitchen with traditional wood-fired oven and BBQ
Camere lussuose con biancheria di pregio: Luxurious rooms with fine linens, each with a unique view of the coast
Bagni eleganti con ceramiche locali e fi: Elegant bathrooms with local ceramics and fine finishes
Spaziosa terrazza con zona pranzo e lett: Spacious terrace with dining area and sunbeds overlooking the coast
Cucina gourmet completamente attrezzata: Fully equipped gourmet kitchen in traditional Italian style
Autentico forno a legna per pizza e barb: Authentic wood-fired pizza oven and barbecue for outdoor cooking
Situati a soli 2 km dal centro paese, go: Located just 2 km from the town center, enjoy the tranquility of the countryside with the convenience of nearby services, easily accessible thanks to the municipal shuttle and local buses.
L'accesso a VINCANTO avviene attraverso: Access to VINCANTO is via a staircase of about 200 steps, a charming path winding through greenery. We consider these steps part of the authentic charm of the place, a small 'formichelle path' once used to transport precious lemons. Climbing up will reward you with an unbeatable view and the feeling of reaching a hidden corner of paradise, far from the daily hustle. It's an invitation to slow down, connect with nature, and enjoy the peace that only places like this can offer.
8 min dal porto di Maiori (6 min dal lun: 8 min from Maiori port (6 min from the seafront)
Descrizione Proprietà: Vincanto is a luxury villa immersed in the lemon groves of the Amalfi Coast. Enjoy comfort, privacy, and breathtaking views.
